text: Resavica may refer to: * Resavica River (Resava), a river in Serbia, tributary to the Resava River * Resavica River (Morava), or Resavčina, river in Serbia, tributary to the Velika Morava * Resavica (town), a town in Serbia * Resavica (village), a village in Serbia * Resavica (coal mine), a coal mine in Serbia
title: Resavica
